last_episode_to_air.name: Wedding of the Season
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nan must figure out her path forward. Jinny feels trapped. Mrs. St. George reckons with the state of her family.

name: The Buccaneers
overview: A group of fun-loving American girls burst onto the scene in tightly corseted 1870s London, kicking off an Anglo-American culture clash. Sent to secure husbands and status, the buccaneers' hearts are set on much more than that.

episodes.name: American Poison
episodes.overview: A group of young American heiresses are changed forever when they're whisked across the Atlantic to London.

episodes.name: Women or Wives
episodes.overview: Conchita hosts a raucous country house party. Jinny and Lizzy go head-to-head for the same man. Nan reveals a secret.

episodes.name: The Perfect Duchess
episodes.overview: At the exclusive Tintagel ball, Nan considers the prospect of becoming a duchess. Conchita struggles with her mother-in-law's approval.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: The girls return to New York for a grand celebration. Nan seeks answers from her family. James begins to manipulate Jinny.

episodes.name: Failed Betrayal
episodes.overview: Things unravel during a weekend at Guy's family home, as Nan finds herself feeling torn. Mabel and Honoria get closer.

episodes.name: It's Christmas
episodes.overview: The gang head to Scotland for a Christmas getaway. Lizzy makes a confession. James' behavior escalates. Nan faces a hard choice.

episodes.name: First Footing
episodes.overview: The Brightlingseas host a New Year's Eve party where the bombshell news is the hot topic. Tensions flare as Theo and Guy's rivalry explodes.

episodes.name: Wedding of the Season
episodes.overview: Nan must figure out her path forward. Jinny feels trapped. Mrs. St. George reckons with the state of her family.
